description:
Who Else Wants to Have a Regular Passive Income Being Automatically Deposited Into Their Account Month After Month?

Digital Information Products Are the Best Way to Have a Passive Income Rolling In Everyday of the Month!

My name is Charity Cason, and I've been creating and selling digital info products for many years now. This course is all about finding a great topic, creating and laying out your content, finding the best delivery methods, using the best sales platforms, creating your marketing funnels and promoting your course for maximum sales.

If you want to create something ONCE and watch it sell for years to come, information marketing is a great option for you!

You do not need to be an expert.

You do not need to know every intricate software program on the market.

You do not need a huge mailing list.

Literally ANYONE can become an information marketer practically overnight!

With some simple to use methods, I can help you:

+ Find the perfect topic that will sell loads of copies

+ Figure out the hot points that your target market wants to know about

+ Discover the best way to teach your target market

+ The tools you need for every kind of info product imaginable

+ The fastest way to come up with content - you're going to love this!

And tons more... PLUS our private discussion area where you can ask questions anytime!

So, click on the JOIN THIS COURSE button and let's start building your passive income empire. :)
title: How to Write and Market An Online Course
